nodes.text: Gercor's Retreat was a palace maintained by the Besadii kajidic on the planet Kor Besadii during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The palace was built across hundreds of islands in the centre of a large swamp and had a decentralized, village-like structure. The palace's buildings included entertainment halls, vaults and private dwellings for members of the Besadii clan.
